comments:
eclipse_3_2_WTP_1.5.1-200607201712

Recent new project, right click action Run XDoclet does nothing and the following appears in the logfile:

!MESSAGE java.lang.NullPointerException
!STACK 0

Maybe this was due to the WTP 1.5 DWP Creation Wizard not creating the WebContent/WEB-INF/classes directory ?

It has started working since I manually did a mkdir.
Fixed in 1.5.1.  NPE is thrown whene there is now source file in the poject.  Action is disabled in that case.
This is part of a "mass update" where bugs showing "fixed" between 7/1/2006 and 9/27/2006 are assumed fixed in WTP 1.5.1. feel free to change the target milestone if you know a more accurate setting.
Closing as resolved since 1.5.1.  If this bug should not be closed, please reopen.
